name: Sunset Planet
description: Sunset Planet is tower defence game. Your beautiful planet has been invaded by alien invaders. Use the mighty power of the ancients and repel the attack of enemy creatures!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD FX4300 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 560 or R7 260 Storage: 2200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
